sub_topic: Identifying the planarity of a graph.
message_1:
Consider the graph shown below. Determine whether this graph is planar or not.

```
     A ---- B
     |      |
     |      |
     C ---- D
```

Hint: A graph is planar if it can be drawn on a plane without any edges crossing each other.
message_2: The graph shown is planar. It can be drawn on a plane without any edges crossing each other. The given representation of the graph already demonstrates this, as there are no edge crossings.
